name: Labor Cinderella
description:
I want to see the prince's at least once!
Cinderella's indomitable challenge!

It's unfair that only stepmother and stepsisters are going to ball!
Sweep and brush! I'm definitely going to the ball!
With the gold earned from doing houseworks
Buy the dresses and hair from the Fairy Godmother ~
Dress up Cinderella with over 9,000 combinations!

Cinderella who attended the ball
Will she be able to capture the prince's heart tonight?

*Ranking and endings depends on the hair, dresses, carriage and coachman total points.

*Fairy Dust are found by the animal friends while they are do housework.

*You must click on the storage button when the storage is full with gold.

*During the FEVER TIME it is best to click on the storage like crazy!!!

*The butler appears on every floor, so be sure to check when you hear the bell.

*If you upgrade all the 7 skills, you will receive an invitation card to the ball.

*You can go upstairs at once by pressing the Full Upgrade button.
